name: Desktop Garage Kit: Go
description:
Desktop Garage Kit : Go

Desktop Garage Kit : Go is an ultra-cute and loveable desktop application. It adopts a cartoon rendering shader similar to Genshin Impact as a tribute to miHoYo, and we've spent a year and a half humbly researching and perfecting it. The software breaks through the barriers between 2D and 3D dimensions, making the desktop characters more delicate and realistic. And it has rich interactive action modules and a brand new massive character update, lively and cute. The brand-new physics engine presents a more realistic movement, supports acting cute, coy, cute, and healing, and has more actions, and interactions. It can always be kept on top of all other windows, always accompanying you, looking forward to your opening.


Don't wait any longer – dive into this enchanting world and elevate your desktop experience today!

Features

▪ Experience the magic of these 3D characters that dance to your music, showcasing dynamic and captivating postures and styles. Immerse yourself in the seamless fusion of music and animation.

▪ Employing a modest yet effective 3D cartoon shader, presenting a pleasantly delicate and realistic visual experience for users to enjoy.
▪ Rich figurine model library, constantly updating.
▪ Brand new physics engine, character image, clothing, and hair support physics motion calculation, presenting more realistic movement.
▪ 168+ 3D posture libraries and 100+ 3D action sets included, making the characters more lively and cute.
▪ Interaction mode button, adding more interesting gameplay.
▪ Particle rendering mode, lighter and shadow special effects presented.
